formattedAddress: 200 W 57th St #310, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 W 57th St #310, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I have recently come across Dr. Lev’s info and decided to visit his office. After my first visit I realized that I am ready to drop all my previous dentists and only come to this office! What a great find. Dr Lev and his team are very professional, punctual, caring and sweet. I had cleaning done and a consultation and I truly enjoyed my overall experience. Finding appointment dates, changing, rescheduling feels easy and seamless. There is never a wait time. Doctor Lev is truly an amazing person and doctor. It’s a pleasure to have the chance to chat to him and he is a real professional. He will be honest with you and not make you do unnecessary things.

originalText.text: My best experience with a dentist in New York. Very pleasant staff, clean, neat, they take care of the patient. Just walked out of their office after a cleaning and a thorough check-up. Highly recommend.

text.text: My best experience with a dentist in New York. Very pleasant staff, clean, neat, they take care of the patient. Just walked out of their office after a cleaning and a thorough check-up. Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
Dr. Lev himself is a great dentist with very nice bedside manner.

This review is solely for his incredibly rude hygienist. She is the sole reason I will not be returning to this practice. I thought perhaps it was the first time I saw her and she was in a bad mood. No, her personality is exceptionally rude, judgmental, assumptive, and unprofessional. On both occasions, I left upset and irritated.

2 stars only for Dr. Lev and his receptionist, who are both lovely.

text.text:

This review is solely for his incredibly rude hygienist. She is the sole reason I will not be returning to this practice. I thought perhaps it was the first time I saw her and she was in a bad mood. No, her personality is exceptionally rude, judgmental, assumptive, and unprofessional. On both occasions, I left upset and irritated.

2 stars only for Dr. Lev and his receptionist, who are both lovely.

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience here.  I had been dreading, DREADING my  dental cleaning for a "certain" number of years and finally bit the bullet, no mouth pun intended, and made an appointment with this office based on two strong recommendations from the Nextdoor app.  Office staff (Kate) was friendly and welcoming, Sophia the hygenist was outstanding, and Dr. Lev himself was an extremely personable and lovely man.  We had a long chat about music.  I DIDN'T get shamed for not having gone to a dentist in a long time, and the cleaning, xrays, and exam were pretty painless.. a pleasant surprise that I will gladly accept.  The price of all this was totally fair.  I will be back, yes, in the recommended six months. Thank you!

originalText.text:
Dr. Alexander Lev is an exceptional doctor.
I have been his patient for many years, always getting high quality dental care in this practice. The visits are usually highly efficient and organized. Excelent well-trained stuff.
